summary: 150 New eyes texture for Humans and Elves
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59192-1-1413684748.jpg[/img]

Eyes of Aber by Aberin

Feature:
- New eyes texture for Humans and Elves
- Standalone, this mod will add 150 new eyes to male and female human and elf player character.
-Mostly Not lore-friendly

[youtube]FlEiM1BMa9U[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5076034]misalen[/url]. Thank you! :D

[youtube]97i4P1-lFE4[/youtube]
-Video by [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/11654708-vatiwah/]vatiwah[/url]. Thank you! :D

Installation:
- Manual = Copy the content into DATA folder.
- Use Nexus Mod Manager for auto-install

History Log:
2014.10.19 v1.0 Released
2014.10.21 v1.1 Some eyes are modified. and 100 Eyes are added to Elves too.
2014.10.24 v1.2 adds 20 new eyes for Humans and Elves
2014.10.29 v1.3 adds 30 new eyes for Humans and Elves
2015.01.18 adds 'Eyes of Aber Ningheim edition by Luminara'. Thanks, [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/213712-luminara/]Luminara[/url]. :)
2015.03.12 adds 'Eyes of Aber Succubus Race edition by guddengg'. Thanks, [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/9146536-guddengg/]guddengg[/url]. :)

Credit:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416]Eye Normal Map Fix[/url] by Mr. Dave

Thank you, LogRaam and Mr. Dave

My Other Mod:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59273]Follower - Agatha[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Agatha')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59362]Follower - Bella[/url] (Adds a standalone female darkelf follower 'Bella')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59419]Follower - Yeriel[/url] (Adds a standalone female follower 'Yeriel')
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59970]Followers of Aber[/url] (Adds 3 standalone female followers)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61937]Males of Skyrim[/url] (Replaces the appearance of some males)[/center]
author: Aberin
